main.p: Here is their personal information so you can find them:

div.p: Junior Software Engineer, Trusted Advisor, Just A Great Guy

main.p: We searched for a person who'd have the ability to determine 8 questions whose answers would help one find their soulmate. BBD's Alexander Kruger was the man for this job! He specially curated these intensive, mind opening & soul searching questions just for SpideySpeedDating. Are you ready to dive deeper into yourself and find your one true love?

main.span: Why did my HTML not load correctly?

footer.a: Not sure how it works? Click here!

main.p: Here's a quick guide on how everything works:

ol.li: Create Your Profile: First things first, set up your profile! Tell us about yourself, and answer some fun questions. Once you're done, hit that "Create Profile" button.
Get Ready to Date: Once your profile is set, you're ready to dive into the dating world! Click on the "Start Dating" button to begin.

Meet the "Insects": In the dating game, you'll find yourself in a web with other users represented as insects. Don't worry, it's all in good fun! Each "round" will present a question, and you'll see the answers from the other users.
Navigate the Web: The spider, that's you, will eliminate one insect at a time based on their answers. It's kind of like a game of elimination! üï∑Ô∏è Bye-bye bugs!
Find Your Match: As the rounds progress, users will be eliminated until there's only one left standing. The spider, that's still you, will then get the remaining user's info, like email address.

main.p: And that's it! It's a fun way to meet new people and see who you vibe with. So go ahead, give it a try and see who you catch in your web! üï∏Ô∏è

span.label: How do you identify your gender?

main.p: You will be redirected when you have been authenticated!

form.label: Were you breastfed as a child?
